title: Operation Midnight Omelette
description: A covert breakfast infiltration mission using a fluffy, cheese-filled payload.
mission_steps: Infiltrate the Pan Zone: Melt butter quietly over medium heat.
Deploy Egg Payload: Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper, then pour into pan.
Cheese Extraction Protocol: Add cheese and fold for secrecy.
Evacuation Maneuver: Slide omelette onto plate and vanish.

title: Operation Frostbite Smoothie
description: A frozen energy asset blended for agents requiring rapid nutritional extraction.
mission_steps: Asset Acquisition: Load all ingredients into the blender.
High-Speed Neutralization: Blend until no identifiable fragments remain.
Payload Deployment: Pour into container and consume swiftly.

title: Operation Shadow Toast
description: A rapid, silent ration ideal for agents operating under deep cover.
mission_steps: Heat Signature Manipulation: Toast bread with minimal noise.
Dual-Layer Encryption: Spread peanut butter, then jam.
Covert Assembly: Add bananas if needed and eat unnoticed.

title: Operation Pasta Firewall
description: Construct a defensive carb barrier for extended operational endurance.
mission_steps: Boiling Point Breach: Cook pasta until al dente.
Garlic Extraction Operation: Sauté garlic in olive oil.
Firewall Construction: Mix pasta with garlic oil and chili flakes.
Encryption Dusting: Finish with Parmesan and serve only to trusted operatives.

title: Operation Stealthy Chocolate Mug Cake
description: A covert microwave dessert for immediate sugar-level restoration.
mission_steps: Containment Protocol: Mix ingredients inside a mug.
Microwave Ignition: Heat until the cake rises to full operational readiness.
Thermal Signature Check: Ensure interior remains classified (moist).
Extraction: Consume before any hostile sensors detect you.
